# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-102">Lukukuittaukset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-103">Pyydä lukukuittaus tai lukukuittausta viestin Outlook Web:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-104">Valitse kolme pistettä</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-105">Luo viestin yläosassa ruutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-106">Valitse **Näytä viestiasetukset**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-107">Valitse **Pyydä lukukuittaus** tai **Pyydä vastaanottokuittaus**- tai molemmat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-108">Voit valita, miten Outlook reagoi pyyntöjen vastaanottoon,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-109">**Asetukset** > **Näytä kaikki Outlookin asetukset** > **Viestin käsittely**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a2f9a-110">Lisätietoja on [Outlookin web-Lukukuittaukset](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2f9a-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
